incomingDamage.name: GravityAcid

scenarios.name: StandardPhantoon

incomingDamage.name: ScrewFlame
incomingDamage.note: Screw Attack makes avoiding damage in general much easier, so we'll have it prevent of half incoming damage

note: This is the scenario for a regular Phantoon fight, so all valid weapons except supers
This scenario estimates roughly 25 seconds per phase, each having 3 opportunities that last 20 frames (2 missiles or 1 charged shot).
3 incoming hits per phase (Half being prevent by Screw).
This scenario expects that the player doesn't know when Phantoon will open its eye

scenarios.name: NintendoPowerPhantoon

incomingDamage.name: ScrewFlame
incomingDamage.note: We're having Screw Attack prevent half of normal damage + all of the enrage damage, which ends up being almost 80% of all incoming damage

note: Five Super Missiles should do the trick!
This scenario estimates roughly 36 seconds per phase (but expecting only 4 enrage phases), each having 1 opportunity that last 20 frames (1 Super).
3 incoming hits per phase (Half being prevent by Screw), + 5 incoming hits per enrage phase (all of which are prevented by screw).
So the player is expected to dodge one enrage wave out of 6.
10 flames farmed per phase, + 10 more per enrage phase.
This scenario expects that the player doesn't know when Phantoon will open its eye
